meanings.definition: The area immediately surrounding a boxing or wrestling ring.
meanings.sent1: I had the best view of the match from ringside.
meanings.sent2: The fans cheered loudly from their ringside seats.
meanings.sent3: The boxer's mom accidentally sat ringside with the opposing team's supporters.
meanings.sent4: The tension at ringside was palpable as the fighters prepared to enter the ring.
meanings.sent5: The lights glared down on the ringside, highlighting the intense action.

meanings.definition: A seat or area located close to the ring where spectators can watch a sporting event.
meanings.sent1: My uncle got us ringside tickets for the big fight.
meanings.sent2: The ringside seats offered an up-close experience of the match.
meanings.sent3: The kids were thrilled to sit ringside, feeling like VIPs.
meanings.sent4: From ringside, you could hear every punch and cheer.
meanings.sent5: The ringside crowd erupted with excitement as the champion entered the ring.
